Summary: Bluish purplelish spheres hovering over the skies
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Stroudsburg
There were no other sightings in Stroudsburg on or around November 1st 1994
divs: Sighting DetailsAt the timeI was in the township of Stroudsburg Pa. where I resided in an apartment complexthat had a porch looking out towards the woods this was back in 1994 on themonth of July I cant remember the exact date. I do know it was during aweekend. I was at the porch ironing my waiter uniform around 830 pm because Iwas getting it ready for the following day for work. Some times, I look up atnight to see the night skies, especially if its nice and crystal clear. On thenight I was ironing my uniform it just happened to be one of those exceptionalnights with a nice pitch black and cloudless nights. I looked up and I saw thisstrange luminous object slowly and gently hovering over the pines trees that arepresent just over the porch. At first I thought it was a star with its purplish3E
